scan_table_check.description: All widget server scripts should check for input that is provided by the client script. Hence the pattern "if (input)" must exist at least once within a server script.
scan_table_check.name: CodeSanity - Widget checks for input
scan_table_check.resolution_details: Refactor the code so that any input processing is done within the scope of the "if (input)" statement.
scan_table_check.short_description: A widget's server script must check if input is provided
